ygData.subject: Re: new player on Bertoxx
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Thanks Jose for the welocme. Hi group, I also found another G/L/B/T EQ group here on Yahoo.  After reading their posts I found that a lot of them play on
ygData.messageBody:
--- In EQ_rainbow@y..., "Jose Muela" <redspieder@h...> wrote:
> you are MOST welcome :) hope your stay with us is wonderfull :)
>

Thanks Jose for the welocme.

Hi group,

I also found another G/L/B/T EQ group here on Yahoo. After reading
their posts I found that a lot of them play on the Namelss server.
So I and my friend Dale (another gay EQer) have started characters on
Nameless.

We are Hype (me), 5th wood elf bard, and Fliq (Dale), 5th wood elf
druid. I'm thinking of restarting Pyotr on that server too.

If anyone is on Nameless server, please let me know so I can friend
list you and maybe we can group. I have talked to another gay EQer
and he is gonna join us there.

thanks,

Scott
